title: Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are dead
creator_credit: Tom Stoppard, Emanuel Azenberg, Michael Brandman, WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.) and Cinecom Entertainment
brief_description: Let Richard Dreyfuss, Tim Roth and Gary Oldman take you one a medieval misadventure, getting themselves in and out of trouble to tell the “true” story (with a few hilarious distractions along the way) of one of the most famous stories of all time.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Stoppard, Emanuel Azenberg, Michael Brandman, WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.) and Cinecom Entertainment
